modName: Minstrel Leather Armor for Sevenbase and CBBE (WIP)
summary: Sevenbase (7B) & CBBE conversion of Minstrel Leather Armor, shared by SkyrimForDaWin.
descriptionHtml:
Hello everyone.

Those are the SeveNBase (7B)/CBBE conversions of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71667/?]Minstrel Leather Armor[/url], created and kindly shared by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4997641/?]SkyrimForDaWin[/url] as a modder resource for the community.

[color=#ff0000][size=3]INSTALL:[/size][/color]

- Use NMM (recommended), MO or extract and drop the archive contents in your Skyrim\Data folder;

[color=#ff0000][size=3]UNINSTALL:[/size][/color]

- Delete the file from your NMM/MO profile or delete the following [b]folders[/b] manually:

\Data\meshes\armor\[b]MinstrelLeatherArmor[/b]
\Data\textures\armor\[b]MinstrelLeatherArmor

[/b]And the file [b]MinstrelLeatherArmor.esp[/b] in Data folder.

[color=#ff0000][size=3]INFORMATION:[/size][/color]

Divided in 3 parts:
- Cuirass
- Boots
- Gauntlets

Craft under Leather category at the forge.

You should consider this mod a WIP, I'm looking for bugs, suggestions and improved textures.

[u]If you are interested in creating some better textures for this armor, please contact me.[/u]

Please refrain from upload this file to other places until it is final.

[color=#ff0000][size=3]CREDITS:[/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4997641/?][b]SkyrimForDaWin[/b][/url] for meshes/textures and permissions;
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?]Crosscrusade DeMoNhUnTeR1986 Sevennity[/url] [/b]for SeveNBase body;
[b][color=#f4f4f4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Ousnius Jeir and Caliente[/url][/color][/b] for CBBE Body;
[b]Gerra6[/b] for [url=http://kgtools.org/ ]KgTools[/url] to create the _1.nif meshes;
[b]Mikanoshi [/b]for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13529/?]SMCO[/url] for textures optimization;
Bethesda for TES games;

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/jrlcosta/myworkshopfiles/?appid=72850]My steam workshop page[/url].
author: SkyrimForDaWin
